name: 跨站聊天
author: Prince

sections.description:
1.As long as one minute, quickly have your site sns function, but do not increase the burden of your system resources.

2.You will not only allow you to stations of visitors has also become a member of your community sns, strengthen their links and you make your site more sticky.

3.You can also, through its head and other cross-Hakata station owners to chat, to strengthen technological exchanges. Visitors on your blog can be free and all other visitors to chat on the blog, of course, to provide them with a registration.

4.After the installation will automatically create a name in the name of your blog site group. You can also set up at its next multi-level group, you can also set up the lower part of your group, you are all members of affiliated groups and mass function of information.

Issues and Warnings

The latest version work only with WordPress 2.6 and above.

Future Releases

[v0.1]
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin to your blog, Activate it.

OK, You’re done!
sections.faq: The plug-style sidebar to accept the management style sheet
